text: Sharpe is an unincorporated community in Marshall County, Kentucky, United States.Sharpe Topo Map in Marshall County, KY Thomas Rickman (1940-2018), American screenwriter, was born in Sharpe.'Tom Rickman, Dead: Screenwriter on "Hooper" and "Coal Miner's Daughter, Dies at 78,' The Hollywood Reporter, Patrick Shanley, September 5, 2018 ==Notes== Category:Unincorporated communities in Marshall County, Kentucky Category:Unincorporated communities in Kentucky
title: Sharpe, Kentucky
